SmartSocks: These socks are embedded with sensors that monitor a person's foot health, detecting any potential issues such as foot fatigue or blisters. They also provide real-time feedback on posture and alignment, helping to prevent injuries. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

ScentSocks: These socks are infused with fragrances that change throughout the day, providing a refreshing and invigorating scent experience. They also contain antimicrobial agents that keep feet feeling clean and fresh. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

CozySocks: These socks are made with extra-plush materials and insulating fibers, providing warmth and comfort in cold temperatures. They also have a built-in heating system that can be activated via a smartphone app, providing an extra boost of warmth when needed. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

GripSocks: These socks have a unique tread pattern that provides superior grip on various surfaces, reducing the risk of slipping and falling. They are ideal for individuals who work in hazardous environments or for people who enjoy outdoor activities such as hiking or running. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

SleepSocks: These socks are designed to promote better sleep by incorporating a special type of fiber that absorbs and dissipates heat, keeping feet cool and comfortable throughout the night. They also contain a calming agent that can help reduce stress and anxiety, promoting a deeper and more restful sleep. (Confidence Score: 0.9)
